extendedInfo.description: Take your skis and hammer down the most beautiful and most dangerous mountains in the world and experience the amazing feeling of Stickman Ski Racer. Perform insane jumps and stunts while rushing down the hills trying to avoid deadly avalanches, rusty weak bridges or profound abysses. Variety and entertainment guaranteed with flood lighted night slopes, snow cannons, deep powder snow, crazy slopes as well as customizable playable characters.  âââââ Regular content updates with new and amazing slopes coming every few weeks! ââââââ¨â¨â From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stickman Base Jumper, Stickman Cliff Diving, Stick Stunt Biker, Rope'n'Fly, Wingsuit Stickman, Line Runner, Line Birds, Line Surfer,Â RunStickRun and moreâ¨â¨FEATURES:â¨â¢ 30 beautiful designed slopes from "Easy" to "Bone breaking"â¢ Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friendsâ¢ Customizable charactersâ¢ Full animated physic rag dollâ¨â¢ Ghost support. Race against your previous rideâ¨â¢ Spectacular crashes and jumpsâ¨â¢ Various obstacles like Avalanches, Bridges, Snow Cannons, Ice or deadly Rocksâ¨â¢ Amazing Retina Graphicsâ¨â¢ Complete physics enabledâ¨â¢ Day/Night mode with realistic lightingâ¨â¢ Various Achievements to unlockâ¨â¢ and many more...â¨â¨â¨â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleâ¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Best of the stickman\'s game!
reviews.comment: Really cool game with good graphics BUT the problem is u need stars which is little bit difficult to collect!! even worth of download
reviews.author: Abrar mohammad

reviews.title: This is the best Stickman game out there.
reviews.comment: It gets infuriating, but it is incredibly fun. Djinnworks has some other Stickman games, Base Jumper And Wingsuit, that are pretty good, but this one rules.

reviews.title: App does not work

reviews.title: LMFAO
reviews.comment: I love this game! I spend all day looking for a great game and never find it. This one is what I have spent all that time looking for. YOU MUST DOWNLOAD!!!
reviews.author: Kevin Cotter

reviews.title: How stupid
reviews.comment: I can\'t unlock world 2 because I need six more stars but I\'ve beat all levels in world 1 except for the time stars but there\'s NO CLOCK. How am I supposed to know how long it took without the stopwatch on screen like ur other games. Fix this and I\'ll add sum stars... Gs3

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: I downloaded... and I cannot even open the game.. force close every single time.

reviews.title: Okay time filler
reviews.comment: Good game but I wish it moved @ a faster pace. The game also shut down during 3rd level 4th stage please fix that.

reviews.title: Fantastic Fun

reviews.title: Worst game ever
reviews.comment: Ski Safari is much much better and Awsome game. But this game really sucks. I was not able to keep my hands on the controls in the tutorial itself. I am uninstalling it right away.

reviews.title: Great gameplay
reviews.comment: Graphics ok and nice physics.
reviews.author: Valentin Rizea

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Hoping for future updates! we want more we want more: levels costumes and achievements. A multilateral mode would be incredible! Like fun run but more fun great job on all the stocks games they are horribly addicting!
reviews.author: Jay Snickles

reviews.title: AT LEAST THE GRAPHICS ARE GOOD
reviews.comment: I tried all stickman games from this developer and this is the best of the bad bunch but sadly thats where the good news ends. The game relies on its very well done graphics to get it thru but the game play mechanics are terrible. Your supposed to swipe to jump with the same hand ur already using to hold down the right side of the screen to accelerate lol. Hazards come out of nowhere so each levels a fluke if u get thru 1st time & not done on skill. You play a bit, hit hazard, die, re-play to get a bit further, hit hazard, die, & repeat this insane process till u FINALLY get thru a level. Camera needs to pull way back to see hazards in time. Just not enjoyable for me so un-installing which is a pity cos I really wanted to enjoy it but it\'s just too frustrating
reviews.author: Lucia Carpenter

reviews.title: OK but impossible
reviews.comment: Good but more than half of the levels are impossible to get 3 stars  So pretty much I don\'t like it more than I like it has a lot of improvement
reviews.author: Conner Boozer

reviews.comment: Simple mechanics, challenging levels, and fun

reviews.title: Addicted
reviews.comment: Addicting and annoying, haha. I can\'t get the jumps down! My timing so bad but its an awesome game!

reviews.title: Fine but ....
reviews.comment: Not bad!!
